thread.title: Leicester City news: Shinji Okazaki likes Instagram post confirming Claudio Ranieri sacking | Metro News
thread.title_full: Leicester City news: Shinji Okazaki likes Instagram post confirming Claudio Ranieri sacking | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Leicester City news: Shinji Okazaki likes Instagram post confirming Claudio Ranieri sacking | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 8:50 pm Claudio Ranieri’s sacking was ‘liked’ by Shinji Okazaki (Picture: Getty) 
Claudio Ranieri may have treated many of his Leicester City players to a triumph unlike anything they’ve ever achieved in their careers (or are likely to again), but it seems some of them have been quick to become ungrateful. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
There had been growing rumours of dressing room unrest at the King Power Stadium this season, and that looks to be the case after tonight’s confirmation that the Foxes had parted company with Ranieri. 
With Leicester confirming the news across their various social media outlets, striker Shinji Okazaki reacted to the news by ‘liking’ the official post confirming the news on Instagram. 
The Japan international was a key player under Ranieri as Leicester won the title last season, but may have become frustrated at a lack of playing time under the Italian this term.
